Sentencas: In this paper the ECLIPSE process simulation package is used to model and make a techno-economic analysis of a range of systems that combine biomass gasification with SOFC stacks.
Titulo: A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Two forms of the SOFC are considered: the intermediate temperature (IT) solid oxide fuel cell and the standard high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The biomass gasification technology, which was selected for integration with the SOFC stacks, was the air-blown downdraught gasifier, because of its simplicity and relative cheapness.
Titulo: A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Willow and miscanthus were taken as the biomass fuels for the power plants.
Titulo: A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the sensitivity of the COE to variations in the fuel cost, the fuel cell cost, the fuel cell lifetime, and the waste heat selling price were examined and compared.
Titulo: A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: From the ECLIPSE simulations, the efficiencies of both the HT and IT 250 kWe systems were found to be around 39% when willow was used as fuel and around 38% with miscanthus, the difference being due to moisture content, rather than any intrinsic property of the biomass.
Titulo: A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Similarly, for the 25-kWe systems, the efficiencies were found to be around 35 and 34% respectively.
Titulo: A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These values are higher than for any other biomass-fired electricity generation technologies of similar scale.
Titulo: A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
A techno-economic analysis of biomass gasifiers integrated with high and intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
